record.dc:title: 1RE26 Bell Site 51RE1, Roane County, Tennessee. Longitudinal section of molds on east end of Floor C. Shows earth casts of disintegrated posts which were harder than surrounding matrix. Direction south.
record.wpa:narrative: Also hoed horizontal postmold near top of trench and two horizontal molds at bottom of trench. Vertical posts varied from 0.2' to 0.3' in diameter, horizontals 0.15' to 0.25' in diameter.
record.wpa:comments: No record on file for this photograph. See also photographs 1RE25 [fhm01411], 1RE27 [fhm01413], 1RE28 [fhm01414], 1RE31 [fhm01416]
